title: [來吧, 我什麼都應承] 侵仔要什麼都自已決定

replies.msg:
Donald Trump warns that if China doesn't rein in North Korea, America will 'solve the problem' as US navy strike force dispatched



A handout photo made available by the US Navy on 09 April 2017 showing the US Navy aircraft carrier USS Carl Vinson (CVN 70), the guided-missile destroyer USS Wayne E. Meyer (DDG 108) and the guided-missile cruiser USS Lake Champlain (CG 57) participate in a photo exercise with Japan Maritime Self-Defense Force destroyers in the Philippine Sea 28 March 2017.



http://www.telegraph.co.uk/news/2017/04/11/donald-trump-warns-china-rein-north-korea-america-will-solve/amp/
